# Social Equity Consulting Services Request for Proposal
**Contract Number:** cb-4289-88195543
**Solicitation Number:** 6050-02
**Publication Date:** March 17, 2023

**Request Overview**
Canada Lands Company CLC Limited invites qualified proposers to provide Social Equity Consulting Services to support the development of a social equity strategy for the Company’s real estate development projects in the National Capital Region. The successful candidate will work closely with the project team to develop and implement a strategic roadmap that embeds social equity and inclusion across all facets of the Company’s real estate development projects.

**Notice Details**

* **Closing Date:** May 1, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Duration:** June 1, 2023 to June 1, 2025
* **Contract Opportunity:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Location:** Ottawa, Ontario
* **End Use:** The services will be used to support the Company’s real estate development projects in the National Capital Region.

**Key Responsibilities**

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

*   Conducting preliminary review of the Company’s existing projects in the NCR
*   Developing and analyzing recommended social equity or community benefits
*   Developing a social equity strategy and implementation roadmap for the NCR
*   Providing support to the project team and external consultants
*   Supporting project engagement efforts as needed

**Instructions to Proposers**

To access the tender document, please follow the link:
*
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4289/ncr---social-equity-consulting-services.pdf
*

Please submit your response in accordance with the instructions outlined in the tender document.

If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to:

Email: [slithwick@clc.ca](mailto:slithwick@clc.ca)
Phone: (343) 573-8821
